title: Generators of hope: the flags are not enough
creator_credit: Stephen Hearst and United Nations Television
brief_description: Defines poverty in terms of “power” and “energy” and tells of the critical gulf between the huge hydroelectrical projects of rich countries and the use of human and animal power in the poor lands. Discusses new possibilities in using energy sources to turn the wheels and light the homes in less-developed lands. Narrated by Alistair Cooke.
